attributes.action: Make MP's who sign up to their parties Manifesto Pledges fully accountable.
attributes.additional_details:
The public has lost total trust in parliament.
I ask the government to make it legally binding for MP's to follow the manifesto's they stand by.
attributes.background: What we have witnessed since the June 2016 Referendum and the subsequent general election is MP's stand by their party manifesto's at the time of elections only to discard it when it doesn't suit their own agendas.
